message: I propose dividing the $10,000 with an 80/20 split in favor of Alice. This offers a good balance considering the diminishing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I'm not convinced that the 80/20 split is fair, especially considering the inflation factor. I'd like to propose a more balanced split.

Considering the inflation, I propose a 50/50 split to ensure both parties receive an equal share of the remaining funds. This maintains fairness while acknowledging the decreasing value of money in subsequent rounds.
